name: 1969: Space, obviously!
description:
Educational game for children of all ages!
Witness the truth of what happened in 69' when the whole globe watched as man, allegedly landed on the moon.

In this game, you will be a part of that process. You will experience how it was landing on the moon. You will help orchestrate one of humankind's biggest milestones... and maybe, just maybe, you might find that things were not quite as they seemed....

Made by:

Alexander K. Risvang

Christopher Nelson

Daniel H. Ditlevsen

Malte Hølledig

Nicklas B. S. Andersen

Music by:

Hans Jonathan Hummelgaard

Requirements: Fingers, eyes, and lightning fast reflexes.

Played on PC/Mac with a mouse and keyboard.
